item.title: Solution Architect (Telecommunication) - Upwork
item.description:
Background / business context
Our client is accelerating its digital transformation. In the Fixed and Mobile Convergence Tribe. They are building a new, modern and fast-paced software development organization with the mission to transform our core and build a world class business support system to support a smooth customer journey.

Activities to be performed
We are looking for a person with a passion for digitalization to join our BSS Architect team. Telenor is rapidly heading towards the digital future and we are looking for people with a natural proactive drive who wants to make a difference.
Close cooperation between Business and IT, ensuring scalable and sustainable growth of our solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional product development teams and stakeholders in a fast-moving environment.
An important part of the role is that you have experience driving digitalization. Self-service / digital first approach. Furthermore, you can drive architectural ideas from concept to implementation by involving teams and other stakeholders both within- and cross IT domains.
To succeed in the role, you are structured and highly committed in what you do. You understand the value of continuous improvement and challenging status quo. You are a driven, self-motivated, communicative. You are a responsible, respectful team player willing to jump in where it is needed to assist the team and ultimately the company to succeed.
Competence requirements

Required:
• Logical thinking
• Architecting distributed systems
• OOP (Preferably Java/SpringBoot)
• Open Mind
• Leadership skills and communication skills

DORA, DevOps, SOLID and SRE are more than just acronyms for you. You are an IT profesional with background as a senior developer, solution architect or business architect with several years of experience and have a relevant post-secondary education. We believe that you’re interested in clean, reusable, modular architecture, and that you’re good at communication and sharing your knowledge with your colleagues. As we are building a new in-house development organisation, it’s also important that you want to actively take part in forming Telenor as a software development compan

Required skills
logical thinking
Java
Devops
OOP
Solid
SpringBoot
DORA
SRE

• You need to be able to be at least 50% on site with the client in Stockholm. Probably less after onboarding, this needs to be negotiated.
• The full assignment must be invoiced over Upwork.
• Please include costs for travel and housing in your quote

Assignment is expected to start in beginning of June and go to at least 31. of December. It will most probably be extended after that.



Posted On: May 25, 2022 20:25 UTC
Category: Solutions Architecture
Skills:Java, Tech & IT, Computing & Networking, JavaScript, DevOps
Skills: Java, Tech & IT, Computing & Networking, JavaScript, DevOps
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: WordPress developer for 5-page website with blog and reusable components - Upwork
item.description:
Build a clean wordpress website without any bloated code which must be extremely fast loading. All pages will be built with 5 breakpoints to allow for all device users (mobile, small tablet, large tablet, laptop and desktop).

You will start by creating reuseable master components so that we can easily extend the site ourselves in the future.

You will also then create the following 5 pages in responsive views.  
Home Page
Department Page
Article Page
Team Page
Project Page

The site will feature:
Blog posts
Videos
Contact form
Newsletter


We will host the site on our own servers so everything must be packaged up, and ready to deploy with instructions and training on how to do this.

Please state your price and estimated timescales for the entire project. The project is available to start immediately. I will share Figma design files with selected developer.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:59 UTC
Category: CMS Development
Skills:WordPress
Skills: WordPress
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: .net consultant required for mobile app project - Upwork
item.description:
We are developing a mobile application for iOS and Android on Xamarin. We require an experienced developer in .net to consult on this project as we go through the QA process.

Ideally looking for someone with extensive experience, a good communicator, able to identify problems using technical knowhow and to advise on solutions to reduce time and costs.

In addition, if the relationship proves to be mutually fruitful, we would like to extend the scope by outsourcing the build of additional features.

item.title: UI UX Designer - Upwork
item.description:
-- Arabic Speaking Candidates Are Preferred --

We are looking for a dynamic UI/UX designer who will be responsible for the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design of our various digital assets. You will ensure that all elements of the online user experience are optimized for improved usability, usefulness, and exceptional visual design.

The successful candidate will evidence a passion for delivering adaptive and creative solutions to UI/UX design problems by staying up to date with best practices and emerging trends in user experience design and user interface technology.

Responsibilities:

Investigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets.
Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy for the brand.
Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.
Designing UI elements and tools such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets for our digital assets.
Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.
Collaborating with the marketing team, and internal and external designers to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the digital user.
Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior.
Adhering to style standards on typography and graphic design.

Requirements:

A bachelor's degree and a minimum of 2 years UI/UX design experience for digital products or services.
A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.
Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, InVision, Visio, HTML, CSS (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite.
A team player but can work independently too.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.


Please send links to your recent work samples.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:41 UTC
Category: UX/UI Design
Skills:User Interface Design, Mobile App Design, Web Design, Responsive Design, Interaction Design, Wireframing
Skills: User Interface Design, Mobile App Design, Web Design, Responsive Design, Interaction Design, Wireframing
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: Test our iOS keyboard extension application / iOS development - Upwork
item.description:
Hii,
We are looking for some US living citizens who have to perform some typing testing for our keyboard extension application. We would be expecting the following details from you-:

1) Download our application from the App Store and use it in your daily routine i.e. in your conversation, email, etc by replacing it with the default Apple keyboard.
2) Note down the typing differences you felt while using our keyboard application, for example in terms of auto-correction or prediction, or auto-suggestion.
3) Kindly maintain a report which includes all the words you typed, the words you expected from our keyboard, and the words you got from our keyboard i.e. in terms of auto-suggestion, auto-correction, predictions and share that excel/google sheet with us.
4) Share/Write your feedback in terms of typing experience difference you felt while using our keyboard application and what's the reason you think would be behind the lag.
5) Last but not least also tell the best feature of our keyboard application and some unique features that most US citizens want to be in their keyboard and are missing in the default Apple keyboard.

Arpit Dwivedi


Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:37 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Swift, Objective-C, iOS, iOS Development, Smartphone, Apple Xcode, QA Engineering, Mobile App Development
Skills: Swift, Objective-C, iOS, iOS Development, Smartphone, Apple Xcode, QA Engineering, Mobile App Development
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Need a react native developer to fix app issues - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a React Native developer with experience in debugging to help us solve some issues in our existing app. If you are able to tell us what went wrong and help us fix the bugs, we would greatly appreciate it.

The app is a simple photo sharing app that allows users to share photos with their friends. We have been having some issues with the app crashing when trying to share photos, and we are also seeing some strange behavior when trying to view photos that have been shared.

If you are interested in helping us debug our app, please let us know.

Budget: $226
Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:30 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:React Native, Android, JavaScript, Mobile App Development
Skills: React Native, Android, JavaScript, Mobile App Development
Country: United States

item.title: Looking for Scottish Developer for our Recording Project - Upwork
item.description:
Hi welcome to our post!
In order to improve personal assistance  ,we need to collect 2 hours natural English conversation recording

The price is for one group prices. For you and your partner, each will get 60 USD from the project.

The recorders need to find an online partner to have a conversation. Or we can find one in our community .Each of you need have a laptop and a phone.

We need to record 4 topics continuously for 2 hours. We need to speak naturally, fluently and clearly. Do not read a script or deliberately simulate others tune.

There is 21 topic to choose from, just pick 4 topics that you and your partner interested in and start recording, ( There is no script involve - just normal day-to-day conversation ).

- All data will be use in research purpose only, and will obey the laws of UK.


Requirements:
- Native Scottish  accent , Efficient English level
- Have a online partner to talk with
- Adequate Phone and laptop

Budget: $120

item.title: Unity Developer (Mobile Games) with +3 years of experience - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, we are a small mobile games studio looking for a mobile games Unity developer on a full time monthly basis job to establish a long-term business relationship.

If you have more than 3 years of PROFESSIONAL experience in Unity development, if you are a C# ninja and a ui warrior, if you know the guts of the Unity platform software and can overcome any integration problem that may occur, vast knowledge of C# language, familiarity with different work environments and knowledge in implementing different SDK's and libraries such as AdMob, Analytics, Adjust, Firebase and many more.

If you have come this far and you still think you are suitable for us and you want to be part of our team, please, contact us.

FULL TIME job on monthly salary!
Please if you don't have 3 years of experience and can hold a project don't waste my and your time!

item.title: Senior Full Stack & Automation Developer (Full-time, GMT+0/GMT+4) - Upwork
item.description:
WHO ARE WE?
ZipoApps is an Israeli start-up using cutting edge technology to manage and optimize a large portfolio of mobile apps. Our mission is to find, evaluate, purchase and grow mobile apps. We have recently secured round A funding, have 80+ apps in our portfolio and are currently experiencing exponential growth.

THE ROLE
We are looking for an experienced Full Stack developer with passion for building automation scripts to further build our set of internal tools. You will architect and develop our core UI components, understand and predict user interactions and create well-written code, based on the business needs. You will work closely with other developers and QA testers, using the Agile methodology and a quality-first approach.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
- 5+ years of experience building publicly available websites
- 5+ years of experience developing production-ready automation scripts (headless chrome, selenium, etc.)
- 5+ years of experience using Javascript, Node.js, HTML, CSS
- Up-to-date with the latest UI frameworks (React, Vue.js, etc.)
- Detail-oriented and able to adhere to deadlines
- Excellent communication skills in both written and verbal English

HOW DO WE WORK?
We are a distributed team of more than 30 people all working remotely. We value open communication, proactivity and work/life balance and we measure our freelancers on performance, rather than on the time spent on the job.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
- 100% remote work
- Flexible full-time working hours (Sunday to Thursday or Monday to Friday)
- A competitive pay in the range of $4.5 K - $6K/month (based on skills and experience)
- The opportunity to grow together with the company & take ownership from day 1

INTERESTED?
Our recruitment process consists of the following steps: HR interview â‡¨ technical discussion â‡¨ take home challenge â‡¨ final interview â‡¨ offer.

Please note that we will only consider individual freelancers that are located in the GMT+0/GMT+4 time zone. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you!



Budget: $6,000
Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:08 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:HTML, Vue.js, JavaScript, Node.js, CSS, React
Skills: HTML, Vue.js, JavaScript, Node.js, CSS, React
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Senior Golang Backend Developer Needed (Full-time, GMT+0/GMT+4) - Upwork
item.description:
WHO ARE WE?
ZipoApps is an Israeli start-up using cutting edge technology to manage and optimize a large portfolio of mobile apps. Our mission is to find, evaluate, purchase and grow mobile apps. We have recently secured round A funding, have 80+ apps in our portfolio and are currently experiencing exponential growth.

THE ROLE
We are looking for an experienced Golang developer to join our R&D team. You will bring a strong opinion to the table, impact architecture and design decisions and be a significant force in the most critical phases of building a new system from the ground up, as well as in hands-on development work. ï»¿You will work closely with other developers and QA testers, using the Agile methodology and a quality-first approach.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
Must-have:
- 5+ years of experience building large scale systems
- 3+ years of experience developing Go in a production environment
- Experience with leading technical initiatives from conception to deployment
- Excellent communication skills in both written and verbal English

Nice-to-have:
- Experience with projects using ML and data science technology
- Prior contribution to open source projects/libraries

HOW DO WE WORK?
We are a distributed team of more than 30 people all working remotely. We value open communication, proactivity and work/life balance and we measure our freelancers on performance, rather than on the time spent on the job.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
- 100% remote work
- Flexible full-time working hours (Sunday to Thursday or Monday to Friday)
- A competitive pay in the range of $5.5K - $7K per month (based on skills and experience)
- Paid national holidays
- The opportunity to grow together with the company & take ownership from day 1

INTERESTED?
Our recruitment process consists of the following steps: HR interview â‡¨ technical discussion â‡¨  take home challenge â‡¨ offer.

Please note that we will only consider individual freelancers that are located in the GMT+0/GMT+4 time zone. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you!


Budget: $7,000
Posted On: May 26, 2022 07:02 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Golang
Skills: Golang
Country: Israel
click to apply
